item.description:
Hola a todos, este sera el segundo encuentro de nuestro grupo. We will use the time to get to know each other a bit more, and practice our spanish. Hope to see all of you.

thanks!
Ana

Hola, como estan todos?
Our last meetup was great, Thanks to Gina,Ralf,David and Ray for coming, and some other guy that happened to be in the Cafe that sat with us for a moment :) we all hope to meet the other members soon at Panera Bread in Shrewsbury. We had a great night of getting to know each other and an awesome spanish conversation, it was really interesting.
Hope to see you all next time!

group.name: The Worcester Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Worcester Spanish Language May Meetup
